data.name: The Academy Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The Academy's OST tells the tale of this unique school, spread across 19 tracks that were expertly crafted, arranged and mixed by Saša Dukić. At moments bursting with youthfulness and optimism, it effortlessly takes a more sinister and darker turn in an instant, like the school itself. The Academy's corridors come alive with these tracks, now relive your adventure in both WAV and mp3 format.
